entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
